price: እነዚያም (በመልክተኞቻችን) የካዱ በአንቀጾቻችንም ያስተባበሉ እነዚያ የእሳት ጓዶች ናቸው፡፡ እነርሱ በውስጧ ዘውታሪዎች ናቸው፡፡
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
